trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula o valor e o local de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> célula para usar ao copiar o conteúdo para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa estrutura é usada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados para a linha que contém a célula que está sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula que está sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto da célula que está sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna que contém a célula que está sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: A coluna que contém a célula que está sendo copiada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de texto da célula que está sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto da célula que está sendo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current and specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o atual e especificadas <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instâncias forem equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instância a ser comparado com o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current and specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instances have the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item*>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*> property values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o atual e especificadas <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instâncias tiverem o mesmo <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>valores de propriedade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: O código hash se baseia o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A>valores de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de dados para a linha que contém a célula que está sendo copiada.
